name: PopupMenuDivider
desc: A horizontal divider in a Material Design popup menu.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height of the divider entry.

fields.name: thickness
fields.desc: The thickness of the line drawn within the [PopupMenuDivider].

fields.name: indent
fields.desc: The amount of empty space to the leading edge of the [PopupMenuDivider].

fields.name: endIndent
fields.desc: The amount of empty space to the trailing edge of the [PopupMenuDivider].

fields.name: radius
fields.desc: The amount of radius for the border of the [PopupMenuDivider].
